title: Leavebuster on bots
body:
Are we seriously giving people Leavebuster on bots? 
I just found out 2 days ago, when I just wanted to complete one mission, that when you leave a game on bots it will give you 6 minutes leavebuster.. Are you freaking serious? Those are BOTS! It will find you another game in like 2 seconds.

Guys tell me, what is your opinion on this. I find it just absurd.

Edit: Dodge penalty
